page.title: 17Flora Dancing.
page.content: I have been doing flora dancing for three years now.In these three years I have always danced the part of a boy.This is because there are not enough boys willing to join in because they think that dancing is a girlish activity.I practise dancing at Goonhavern School with the headmaster and other children at lunch times and during any free time that we manage to get.We dance to entertain the visiters at Newquay and Perranporth and anywhere else that they happen to be.The flora dance originated from the Furry dance which was performed in days gone by to greet the summer flowers.Today it is much more commercial and we collect money from the tourists to boost the organising band which puts it to the 1900 week where a lot of free entertainment is provided for everybody.
